flawed_nl_solution:
Jen scored 20 + 10 = <<20+10=30>>30 on the exam.
Sammy scored two less, so his score was30 - 2 = <<30-2=32>>32.
Thus, Sammy made 35 - 32 = <<35-32=3>>3 mistakes.
